title: Online Integrated Language Learning Course through Digital Archive Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of digital literacy and linguistics
context.additional_context: Learners focus on analyzing digital archive materials to explore language evolution and cultural contexts. The course is designed to integrate real-time collaboration tools and digital archive platforms.

learning_goals: Learners can design a language resource collection system using metadata standards for digital archives.
Learners can analyze digital archive materials to explain historical changes in language usage patterns
Learners can use online collaboration tools to share experiences in building a language archive with peer learners

resources: National Digital Archive Program Sample Dataset

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
